name: Adventure Car Racing
description:
Adventure Car Racing  is a 2D car racing game, climb and race through mountains with a car of your choice. Collect coins to unlock more cars and levels. Download the game and live the adventure now!

Amazing Features of Race: Adventure Car Racing
• Complete range of top speed lightning cars

• Time Mode to check your stunt skills

• High-quality music and rocking sound

• Real and Exotic stunt levels

• Tasks - Each car has own set of task to complete!

• Unlock - Unlock cars and choose the best one for your racing style!

• Realistic and high physics lightning car controls

• Narrow and sharp sky high mountain tracks

• Handcrafted Tracks - Get the best racing experience on tracks thought out to the smallest detail!
